episodes.summary: The Flash stops a robbery but the culprits get away after shooting a guard, and The Flash chooses to save the man instead of following the criminals. Joe shows Barry a book of suspects and Barry identifies Leonard Snart as the leader of the group. While investigating the case, Barry gets a surprise visit from an old friend - Felicity Smoak, who heard about his new abilities and came to check them out for herself. She joins him at S.T.A.R. Labs to help stop Snart after it's revealed that Snart his gotten his hands on a stolen "cold gun," which could kill The Flash. Dr. Wells is furious when he finds out that Cisco built the cold gun without telling anyone and now it's missing. Meanwhile, Iris is getting the silent treatment from Joe because of her relationship with Eddie. Finally, The Flash and Captain Cold have an epic confrontation.

episodes.name: Plastique
episodes.summary: After a bomb goes off downtown, the army, led by General Eiling, rolls in and takes over the case, much to Joe's surprise. Suspicious, Joe tells Barry that he and his friends at S.T.A.R. Labs should look into the army's involvement. Wells informs the team that Eiling was experimenting on his men to turn them into super soldiers. Cisco confirms one of Eiling's soldiers, Bette Sans Souci, was at the bomb site. The Flash tracks her down and realizes that she's not setting off the bombs, she is a meta-human who can blow things up just by touching them. Meanwhile, when Joe learns Iris is writing about "the streak," he tells Barry to make her stop. Barry realizes Iris won't listen to him so he decides to have The Flash pay her a visit.

episodes.name: The Flash Is Born
episodes.summary: The Flash faces a new meta-human named Tony, who can turn himself into girded steel at will. While Dr. Wells and Caitlin are concerned about Barry's safety, Cisco comes up with a plan to take Tony down. Meanwhile, Iris's blog on The Flash gets her into trouble, and Eddie witnesses Tony's abilities firsthand and begins to ask questions that Joe doesn't want answered. Joe asks Dr. Wells to help him solve Nora Allen's murder.

episodes.name: Power Outage
episodes.summary: The Flash goes up against Farooq aka Blackout, a metahuman who can harness electricity. During their battle, Farooq zaps The Flash and siphons all his electricity, leaving The Flash without his speed. Dr. Wells, Caitlin and Cisco work to reverse the effects on Barry, but their efforts are disrupted when Farooq comes banging on S.T.A.R. Labs doors in search of Wells, who he blames for his accident. Without Barry's powers to protect them, the group must figure out a way to save themselves from the metahuman. Meanwhile, Tockman manages a coup inside the Central City police department and takes several people hostage, including Joe and Iris. While Iris is sure The Flash will save them, Eddie has a trick up his sleeve.

episodes.name: Flash vs. Arrow
episodes.summary: Barry is thrilled when Oliver, Felicity and Diggle come to Central City to investigate a case involving a deadly boomerang. Excited about teaming up with his friend, Barry asks Oliver if he'd like to help him stop Ray Bivolo, the meta-human Barry is currently tracking. Bivolo causes people to lose control of their emotions and has been using that skill to rob banks. Unfortunately, the superhero partnership doesn't go as smoothly as Barry expected. When Oliver tells Barry he still has a lot to learn, Barry sets out to prove him wrong by attempting to stop Bivolo alone. However, when Bivolo infects Barry and sets him on a rage rampage, everyone is in danger, and the only one who can stop him is the Arrow. Meanwhile, Iris is furious when Eddie tries to get a task force to stop The Flash, Joe and Dr. Wells agree the Arrow is a bad influence on Barry, and Caitlin and Cisco deal with a new team in S.T.A.R. Labs.

episodes.name: The Man in the Yellow Suit
episodes.summary: Barry finds himself face-to-face with his nemesis, the man in the yellow suit, a.k.a. Reverse Flash, who killed his mother. Barry is frustrated when the Reverse Flash escapes, but Dr. Wells and Cisco come up with a plan to trap him. All they need is bait, so they turn to Dr. Tina McGee from Mercury Labs to help. Meanwhile, it's Christmas at The West household and Iris is in full holiday cheer. Eddie gives her a surprising gift but also leaves her with a question that could change her life. Joe joins the search for the man in yellow and ends up in the crossfire.

episodes.name: Revenge of the Rogues
episodes.summary: Leonard Snart AKA Captain Cold returns to Central City with a new hotheaded partner in tow - Mick Rory AKA Heat Wave. The duo plan to steal a multi-million dollar painting, but Cold has another agenda while in town - to set a trap for The Flash. Snart and Mick kidnap someone close to The Flash and threaten to kill them unless The Flash shows up for a battle of fire and ice. Barry tells Joe he isn't sure he should take on Snart again after the casualties that happened the last time they fought. Meanwhile, Barry asks Dr. Wells, Caitlin and Cisco to help him double his training efforts so he's ready for the Reverse Flash when he returns to Central City. Iris deals with the aftermath of Barry's confession, and Cisco makes the CCPD a new shield.

episodes.name: The Sound and the Fury
episodes.summary: Dr. Wells' former prot√©g√©e, Hartley Rathaway, returns to seek revenge on his mentor after being affected by the particle accelerator explosion. Now able to manipulate sound waves, the brilliant Rathaway is a dangerous threat to both Wells and The Flash. Meanwhile, Iris is thrilled when she's hired by the Central City Picture News as their newest cub reporter. Unfortunately, her editor pairs her with a veteran reporter, Mason Bridge, who wants nothing to do with her. Cisco recalls his first day on the job at S.T.A.R. Labs when he met Hartley and Caitlin. Joe asks Eddie for a favor but asks him to keep it a secret from Barry.

episodes.name: Crazy for You
episodes.summary: Caitlin decides that she and Barry need to move on from Ronnie and Iris and find new loves so she takes him for a night out at the local karaoke bar. Caitlin doesn't have any luck making a love connection but Barry meets Linda Park, a sports reporter for the Central City Picture News, and asks her out on a date. When Barry tells Iris he has a date, Iris is surprised by her reaction. Meanwhile, Cisco considers Hartley's dangerous offer and the team searches for Shawna, a meta-human with teleportation powers, who just busted her boyfriend Clay out of Iron Heights. When Henry snoops around in an attempt to help Joe and Barry solve the crime, he ends up in the infirmary after getting roughed up by inmates.

episodes.name: The Nuclear Man
episodes.summary: After Ronnie attacks a physicist, Barry and the team realize they need to go after Caitlin's fianc√© who is now a dangerous meta-human. They deduce the best way to track Ronnie is to find Dr. Martin Stein who was working on a project called F.I.R.E.S.T.O.R.M. Barry struggles to balance his duties as The Flash and his relationship with Linda Park, and Joe enlists Cisco's help to reinvestigate the murder of Nora Allen. General Eiling returns to Central City.

episodes.name: Fallout
episodes.summary: After the nuclear explosion separates Ronnie and Dr. Stein, Barry and the team believe both men are safe. Caitlin is thrilled to have her fianc√© back and prepares to resume their life together while Dr. Stein returns to his wife. However, when General Eiling targets Firestorm, Ronnie and Dr. Stein must decide if they are safer together or apart. Meanwhile, Mason Bridge tells Iris that there is something secretive going on at S.T.A.R. Labs and Dr. Stein gives Barry some important information about time travel.

episodes.name: Out of Time
episodes.summary: Mark Mardon aka The Weather Wizard appears in Central City intent on avenging his brother Clyde's death, and sets his sights on Joe, who shot Clyde. When Mardon attacks Joe and Barry, Barry is able to super-speed them to safety but Mardon gets away. Barry warns Joe not to go after a meta-human alone but Joe doesn't listen and ends up in grave danger. Meanwhile, Cisco looks into the night the team captured the Reverse Flash and realizes something doesn't add up and begins to wonder whether Joe was right about Dr. Wells. Barry and Linda end up on an awkward double date with Eddie and Iris.

episodes.name: Rogue Time
episodes.summary: The Flash learns that Captain Cold and Heat Wave have returned to Central City. This time Snart has brought along his baby sister Lisa to help wreak havoc on the city.

episodes.name: Tricksters
episodes.summary: Copycat killer who goes by the name "The Trickster" starts setting off bombs in Central City. In order to stop the villain, Barry and Joe meet with the original Trickster, a criminal mastermind named James Jesse, who has been imprisoned for 20 years. Things quickly go from bad to worse when the Tricksters unite and take Henry prisoner. Meanwhile, Iris asks Eddie for help with a case, and flashbacks show how Harrison Wells came up with the idea for the particle accelerator.

episodes.name: All Star Team Up
episodes.summary: Barry is surprised when Felicity Smoak arrives from Starling City along with her boyfriend, Ray Palmer, who flies in as the Atom. They've come to visit S.T.A.R. Labs as Ray needs help with his suit. Their timing turns out to be fortuitous because it's all hands on deck after a meta human named Brie Larvan unleashes hundreds of robotic bees to attack and kill her former co-workers, including Dr. Tina McGee. A group dinner with Barry, Felicity, Ray, Iris and Eddie turns into a disaster.

episodes.name: Who Is Harrison Wells?
episodes.summary: Joe and Cisco head to Starling City to continue their investigation of Dr. Wells. While in town, the duo enlists the help of Captain Lance, and Cisco meets the Black Canary, who asks him for a favor. Meanwhile, back in Central City, Barry races to catch a meta-human named Hannibal Bates who can transform himself into every person he touches - which includes Eddie, Iris, Caitlin and even The Flash.

episodes.name: The Trap
episodes.summary: Barry, Caitlin, Cisco and Joe set a trap for Wells. Cisco uses himself as prey which puts him in grave danger. Meanwhile, Eddie makes a decision regarding Iris, which leaves Joe a bit unsettled.

episodes.name: Grodd Lives
episodes.summary: Barry must deal with the Reverse Flash's latest threat to a member of the group. To make matter worse, Dr. Wells unleashes Grodd on the city in order to distract Barry and the team. Joe, Barry and Cisco head down into the sewers to catch Grodd but the gorilla quickly gets the upper hand after he kidnaps Joe. Iris and Barry have a heart to heart talk.

episodes.name: Rogue Air
episodes.summary: As Wells once again gets the upper hand on the S.T.A.R. Labs team, Barry realizes he needs to make a big move and reaches out to an old foe, Captain Cold, for help. Joe and Caitlin warn Barry that Cold can't be trusted. True to form, Cold has his own agenda that involves the meta-humans trapped in the containment cells. As things seem to be going from bad to worse, The Flash gets reinforcements - Arrow and Firestorm.

episodes.name: Fast Enough
episodes.summary: Harrison presents Barry with an impossible choice: save Nora and create an alternate timeline, while letting Harrison escape. or let his mother die as she did in the original timeline.

episodes.name: The Man Who Saved Central City
episodes.summary: Six months after the Flash and his friends stop the Singularity, Central City holds a rally in the speedster's honor. However, Barry doesn't want to go given the sacrifice that was made by the true hero. Meanwhile, a new metahuman, Atom Smasher, sets out to kill the Flash.

episodes.name: Flash of Two Worlds
episodes.summary: The team's visitor, Jay Garrick, explains that he comes from a parallel world and was a speedster there, but lost his powers transitioning over. Now he insists that Barry needs his help fighting a new metahuman, Sand Demon, who came from Jay's world. Meanwhile, Officer Patty Spivot tries to join Joe's Metahuman Taskforce.

episodes.name: Family of Rogues
episodes.summary: Lisa Snart, aka Golden Glider, comes to the team for help when her brother Captain Cold is kidnapped. However, the Flash soon discovers that the villain is working for his father Lewis, who has some mysterious hold over him. Meanwhile, Caitlin and Jay work together to build a speed cannon so that Jay can return to Earth-2, and Joe tells Iris the truth about her mother.

episodes.name: The Fury of Firestorm
episodes.summary: Martin begins to destabilize without Ronnie to merge with him, and the team desperately seek out another metahuman with similar abilities. They find two men: Henry Hewitt and Jefferson "Jax" Jackson. Meanwhile, Iris does some digging into Francine's past, and Barry is hesitant to become involved with Patty after what happened between him and Iris.

episodes.name: The Darkness and the Light
episodes.summary: Barry battles another breacher, Doctor Light... and discovers that she's Linda's evil counterpart. Meanwhile, the team deals with a new Harrison Wells in their midst, and Barry asks Patty out on a date.

episodes.name: Enter Zoom
episodes.summary: After Dr. Light escapes from her pipeline cell, Barry asks Linda to help them lure Zoom to their world. Meanwhile, the team questions Harrison's motives and Cisco tries to use his powers on the Earth-2 visitor.

episodes.name: Gorilla Warfare
episodes.summary: While Harrison tells the team that he's heading back to Earth 2 now that they've failed to stop Zoom, Grodd launches a new series of attacks in an attempt to gain the chemicals that he needs to augment his intelligence. Meanwhile, Barry deals with his loss of self-confidence after Zoom cripples him, and Iris calls in a familiar face to help.

episodes.name: Legends of Today
episodes.summary: Barry and Cisco take Kendra to Oliver and his team, looking for protection when a mysterious immortal comes seeking Kendra. However, a figure from her past arrives to tell her the truth. Meanwhile, Jay refuses to help Harrison test his new speed-enhancement serum, Velocity-6.

episodes.name: Running to Stand Still
episodes.summary: Weather Wizard frees Captain Cold and Trickster from prison to help him get revenge on the Flash, but Cold has second thoughts. Meanwhile, iris tells Joe about the son he never knew he had, and Patty confronts the man who killed her father.

episodes.name: Potential Energy
episodes.summary: The Flash and his friends go up against a new meta-human, the Turtle. Meanwhile, Caitlin discovers the source of Jay's problems, and Patty questions whether she and Barry can have a relationship.

episodes.name: The Reverse-Flash Returns
episodes.summary: Eobard Thawne--Reverse-Flash--kidnaps Dr. McGee and forces her to find a way to send him back to his own time. Flash and his friends discover that Reverse-Flash is from a timeline before he killed Barry's mother, and realize that they may have no choice but to send him back. Meanwhile, Harry and Cisco work to stabilize Cisco's vibe power, and Caitlin desperately tries to find a cure for Jay's illness.

episodes.name: Fast Lane
episodes.summary: While Flash takes on a new meta, dubbed Tar Pit, Barry offers to help Harry come up with a way to seal the breaches. He's unaware that Harry has secretly siphoned off some of Barry's speed... and plans to remove the rest.

episodes.name: Welcome to Earth-2
episodes.summary: Barry and Cisco travel to Earth-2 with Harry to rescue his daughter, and discover a strange world where friends are enemies and enemies are even worse. Meanwhile, Caitlin help Jay regain his speed so that he can deal with a new metahuman menace, Geomancer.

episodes.name: Escape from Earth-2
episodes.summary: While Cisco and Harry go looking for a captive Barry, Barry makes contact with the masked prisoner and learns that he is connected with Jay. Meanwhile, On Earth-1, Caitlin perfects Velocity-9 so that Jay can go up against Geomancer before he brings Central City down.

episodes.name: King Shark
episodes.summary: King Shark escapes from ARGUS captivity and makes his way to Central City to kill the Flash. However, the hero and his friends are preoccupied with the recent death of one of their own. Meanwhile, Wally resents Barry's presence in his family.

episodes.name: Trajectory
episodes.summary: A new speedster arrives in Central City and spreads chaos wherever she goes. Flash takes the blame, and Iris' editor plans to write an expose on the hero. Meanwhile, Jesse discovers how far her father will go to protect her.

episodes.name: Flash Back
episodes.summary: When Barry reaches a dead end in going faster, he decides to travel into the past and trick Eobard Thawne--posing as Harrison Wells--into showing him how to go faster. However, something, in the timestream follows Barry back... and it's not friendly.

episodes.name: Versus Zoom
episodes.summary: With Harry's help, Barry becomes fast enough to stop Zoom. Using Vibe's powers, the team contacts Zoom on the other Earth and use his past to trap him. But Zoom manages to escape their trap and takes one of them hostage to force Barry to give up his speed.

episodes.name: Back to Normal
episodes.summary: Barry tries to cope with a life without superspeed, but finds himself forced to don the Flash suit when a metahuman abducts Harry believing that he's Harrison Wells. Meanwhile, Wally asks Joe to arrange a meeting for him with Flash, and Caitlin tries to escape her captivity.

episodes.name: Rupture
episodes.summary: Zoom begins his reign of terror, unleashing the Earth Two version of Cisco's brother Dante on the populace. Meanwhile, Barry debates whether to undergo the dangerous process Harry has created to give him back his speed.

episodes.name: The Runaway Dinosaur
episodes.summary: While Barry is trapped in the Speed Force, his friends desperately try to bring him home... only to discover that he may not want to leave. Meanwhile, the particle experiment reanimates one of the team's old foes, who is obsessed with finding Iris.

episodes.name: Invincible
episodes.summary: The Earth Two metahumans attack Central City en masse, and Barry is oddly confident that the team can handle them. Meanwhile, Cisco has vibes of an ominous future, and meets the Earth Two counterpart of a woman he loved.

episodes.name: The Race of His Life
episodes.summary: The team discovers what Zoom is up to, and why he wants Barry to race him. When they realize that Barry is out of control after the death of someone close to him, they lock Barry up for his own safety rather than let him participate in a race he can't win.

episodes.name: Flashpoint
episodes.summary: After preventing his mother's death and altering history, Barry has a perfect life in the resulting timeline. But memory losses suggest that the danger isn't yet over.

episodes.name: Paradox
episodes.summary: Barry discovers that he didn't restore the timeline as it originally was, and tries to reconcile the difference. Meanwhile, the Edward Clariss of the new timeline teams up with a new villain to bring Flash down.

episodes.name: Magenta
episodes.summary: A new metahuman, Magenta, unleashes a magnetic wave of terror on the city. Meanwhile, Harry and Jesse come over from Earth-2 and reveal that Jesse now has superspeed... and Wally wonders if he gained the same power.

episodes.name: The New Rogues
episodes.summary: Taking the name of Jesse Quick and donning a mask, Jesse offers to help Barry against two metas, Mirror Master and Top. However, her inexperience puts her in danger and gets Flash trapped in a mirror. Meanwhile, Harry, Cisco, and Caitlin search the other Earths for a replacement for a Harry.

episodes.name: Monster
episodes.summary: A monster appears in downtown Central City and Julian vows to find the person responsible. While Flash tries to deal with the creature, Cisco tries to deal with his new teammate H.R. and realizes that he's hiding something.

episodes.name: Shade
episodes.summary: While Barry tries to deal with a new metahuman, Shade, Alchemy tries to convince Wally to join him and gain the powers that he had in Flashpoint.

episodes.name: Killer Frost
episodes.summary: Flash discovers that he's powerless against Savitar's superior speed, but other matters take precedence when Caitlin turns into Killer Frost and goes on a rampage trying to find Alchemy.

episodes.name: Invasion!
episodes.summary: The alien Dominators land on Earth, and Barry realizes that he can't fight them alone. He summons Green Arrow and his teammates, and then the Legends, and then Supergirl from her Earth. However, the discovery of future-Barry's message forces Barry to reveal that he may have altered all of their lives when he changed the timeline, sowing the seeds of mistrust.

episodes.name: The Present
episodes.summary: As Christmas arrives, the team discovers Alchemy's identity. Jay travels from Earth 3 to lend the team a hand against Savitar, while Joe forbids Wally from helping.

episodes.name: Borrowing Problems from the Future
episodes.summary: Barry finally tells Iris and the others--except Joe--what he saw in the future and together they set out to stop that future from coming to pass. Meanwhile, Caitlin invites Julian to join Team Flash, and H.R. prepares to open the museum.

episodes.name: Dead or Alive
episodes.summary: A "collector" from Earth-19 arrives to take H.R. to pay with his life for traveling between dimensions. While Cisco challenges her to a trial by combat, Iris sets out to make her mark on the world before the future that Barry saw comes to pass.

episodes.name: Untouchable
episodes.summary: A new metahuman, Clive Yorkin, goes after the alternates of the people that wronged him in Flashpoint by turning them into ash. Meanwhile, Iris and Barry finally tell Joe about what Barry saw in the future.

episodes.name: Attack on Gorilla City
episodes.summary: Barry, Cisco, Caitlin, and Julian travel to Gorilla City on Earth 2 to rescue Harrison. However, they are soon captured and Barry is forced to fight a battle to the death against the gorillas' ruler, Solovar.

episodes.name: Attack on Central City
episodes.summary: Barry considers killing Grodd to stop him, but Harry convinces him that there's always another way. Meanwhile, Jesse tells her father that she's staying on Earth-1 and is surprised at his reaction.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Savitar
episodes.summary: The team is forced to use Julian as a conduit to Savitar to question the God of Speed. Meanwhile, Wally is haunted by visions of Savitar that slowly become more real.

episodes.name: Into the Speed Force
episodes.summary: Barry enters the Speed Force to rescue Wally, and meets some familiar faces. Meanwhile, Jesse ignores H.R.'s advice and sets out to find and defeat Savitar on her own.

episodes.name: Duet
episodes.summary: When Mon-El and Hank bring Kara to Earth-1 to ask Team Flash for help, Music Meister puts Barry under his spell as well and traps him and Kara in a musical where they have to finish the story to escape... and if they die in the musical then they die in real life as well. This story line started at the end of Supergirl: "Star-Crossed", Season 2, Episode 16.

episodes.name: Abra Kadabra
episodes.summary: A new villain, Abra Kadabra, seeking out high-tech items. When Flash captures him, Abra offers the speedster Savitar's name if Flash lets him go. Meanwhile, Julian is forced to operate on a badly injured Caitlin.

episodes.name: The Once and Future Flash
episodes.summary: Barry travels to 2024 to discover who Savitar is and use the information to save Iris. However, he soon discovers that Team Flash was destroyed when Iris was killed... and Barry is responsible. Meanwhile, Killer Frost finds someone who can give her what she wants.

episodes.name: I Know Who You Are
episodes.summary: The team finds Tracy Brand, the woman that Future-Barry said would be able to imprison Savitar four years in the future. However, Savitar intends to kill Tracy and is using Killer Frost to do so. Meanwhile, Cecile tells Joe that she loves him and he freezes up.

episodes.name: Cause and Effect
episodes.summary: Cisco comes up with a plan to stop Savitar involving preventing Barry from forming short-term memories. However, the plan doesn't go as intended. Meanwhile, Killer Frost returns to S.T.A.R. Labs to help the team.

episodes.name: Infantino Street
episodes.summary: With 24 hours left to save Iris, Barry recruits Len Snart from the past to steal a Dominator power cell from ARGUS. Meanwhile, Joe and Kid Flash take Iris somewhere that Savitar can't find her, and Killer Frost calls Vibe out to kill him... and the last vestiges of her old self.

episodes.name: Finish Line
episodes.summary: Savitar kills one of the team, and then comes up with a new plan to become a god‚Ä¶ and Barry must come up with a way to stop him.

episodes.name: The Flash Reborn
episodes.summary: Cisco comes up with a way to bring Barry back from the Speed Force when a new villain challenges Flash to a fight. However, Barry is... different than when he went in.

episodes.name: Mixed Signals
episodes.summary: Barry and Iris discover that they're having communication issues and go in for couples therapy... just as a new meta starts targeting tech billionaires. Meanwhile, Cisco inadvertently blows off a special day for Gypsy.

episodes.name: Luck Be a Lady
episodes.summary: The team goes up against the second of the Thinker's metas: Becky Sharpe, aka Hazard, who can gain good luck for herself as long as everyone else suffers. Meanwhile, Cecile suggests to Joe that they buy a new house, and Iris tries to plan the wedding.

episodes.name: Elongated Journey Into Night
episodes.summary: While looking for the bus passengers, Barry and Joe come across Ralph Dibny, a former cop who was fired from the force and gained a.... unique power from the dark matter. Meanwhile, Gypsy's father Breacher comes to see his daughter's new boyfriend Cisco, and soon starts hunting him.

episodes.name: Girls Night Out
episodes.summary: The guys and girls throw separate parties for Barry and Iris. While Barry gets drunk with some help from Cisco and Ralph takes them to a strip club, the ladies get involved with Killer Frost when her former boss, Amunet, demands that Killer Frost return to work for her.

episodes.name: When Harry Met Harry‚Ä¶
episodes.summary: Flash and Elongated Man team up to fight one of the Thinker's metas, a Sioux Indian woman calling herself Black Bison that is hunting down the three pieces of an artifact. Meanwhile, Harry calls together three of his counterparts to form the "Council of Wells" and figure out who DeVoe is.

episodes.name: Therefore I Am
episodes.summary: Barry risks his career and his team trying to confirm that Clifford DeVoe is their unseen adversary. Meanwhile, the origin of the Thinker is revealed.

episodes.name: Crisis on Earth-X, Part 3
episodes.summary: While Flash, Arrow, White Canary, Firestorm, and Alex attempt to return to Earth-1, Felicity and Iris team up to free Kara before Eobard and Fuehrer Queen remove her heart and transplant it into Overgirl.

episodes.name: Don't Run
episodes.summary: Iris has to choose between her husband and her friend when Amunet abducts Caitlin while Thinker captures Flash. Meanwhile, Caitlin meets a new metahuman, and Thinker unveils the next stage of his plan.

episodes.name: The Trial of the Flash
episodes.summary: While Barry stands trial for Clifford's murder, a new meta threatens Central City and only Flash can stop him.

episodes.name: The Elongated Knight Rises
episodes.summary: While Barry sits in prison, Ralph faces his first major supervillain and is injured for the first time. He has second thoughts about being a hero, and turns to Barry for advice.

episodes.name: Honey, I Shrunk Team Flash
episodes.summary: The team goes after a meta with the power to shrink people and objects... and Cisco and Ralph ended up reduced to two inch height. Meanwhile, Barry tries to give Big Sir hope that they can clear his name.

episodes.name: True Colors
episodes.summary: When Wolfe offers Barry and the bus metas to Blacksmith, Barry engineers an escape for all of them. Meanwhile, Ralph has a crisis of faith when an old "friend" tells him that he eventually fails everyone who counts on him.

episodes.name: Subject 9
episodes.summary: The team discovers the identity of the ninth bus meta, but she doesn't want their protection. Meanwhile, Cecile turns to Harry for help when Joe's dreams keep her awake at night.

episodes.name: Enter Flashtime
episodes.summary: A terrorist detonates a nuclear bomb, and Flash must race between microseconds to try and stop it. Jesse and Jay lend their speed to his efforts, but even the three of them aren't fast enough to stop a nuclear explosion that has already happened.

episodes.name: Run, Iris, Run
episodes.summary: Iris accidentally takes Barry's speed when a new meta with the power to swap powers touches both of them. Now they have to learn how the other half lives as Iris takes to the field and Barry monitors events. Meanwhile, Ralph refuses to leave S.T.A.R. Labs for fear that Clifford will kill him, and Harry undertakes a dangerous experiment to match their opponent's augmented intellect.

episodes.name: Null and Annoyed
episodes.summary: The Mechanic discovers what Thinker has been doing to her, and Breacher comes asking Cisco for help. Meanwhile, Team Flash goes after Subject 11, who can control gravity, and Barry questions if Ralph takes anything seriously.

episodes.name: Lose Yourself
episodes.summary: Team Flash tracks down the last bus meta, Edwin Guass, and discover that he holds the key to defeating Thinker. Meanwhile, Ralph considers taking extreme measures against Thinker,

episodes.name: Fury Rogue
episodes.summary: While Harry discovers the results of the Thinking Cap overload on his mind, the rest of the team call on a former ally to help them transport Fallout away from Thinker.

episodes.name: Therefore She Is
episodes.summary: Thinker continues with his "Enlightenment", and Gypsy joins Team Flash to try and stop him... and to discuss her relationship with Cisco.

episodes.name: Harry and the Harrisons
episodes.summary: When they need an organic weapon to use against Thinker, Team Flash turns to Amunet... but Caitlin has an ulterior motive. Meanwhile, Cisco forms a "Council of Harrisons" after the Council of Wells kicks Harry out of the group.

episodes.name: Think Fast
episodes.summary: Thinker gathers the final component in his master plan, and to stop him Barry must train Cisco and Caitlin how to function in Flash Time. However, he refuses to endanger more of his friends. Meanwhile, Harry has an idea as to where they can find Marlize, and Cecile's pregnancy has strange side effects on her telepathy.

episodes.name: We Are the Flash
episodes.summary: With Marlize's help, Barry tries to make a last-ditch attempt to reach the good DeVoe inside of the Thinker... and meets an old friend.

episodes.name: Nora
episodes.summary: After Nora meets her parents and reveals that she's stuck in 2018, Flash goes off after a new meta--Gridlock--and subsequently discovers what happens to himself in the future.

episodes.name: Blocked
episodes.summary: The team take on a new meta with the ability to create blocks out of concentrated air. Meanwhile, Danielle realizes that she's losing her powers, Barry tries to deal with an overeager Nora, Cisco deals with the loss of Gypsy, and Caitlin wonders whether to track down her father.

episodes.name: The Death of Vibe
episodes.summary: While Caitlin and Ralph look into Thomas Snow's death, the others deal with Cicada and bring in a consulting detective to help them.

episodes.name: News Flash
episodes.summary: Nora reveals what Iris did to her in the future that causes her to be so hostile to her in the present. Ralph and Sherloque try to trace Cicada, and Team Flash faces someone with the ability to control minds.

episodes.name: All Doll'd Up
episodes.summary: A new meta launches an attack on Central City, and Flash tries to deal with him while Nora avoids Iris. Meanwhile, Cisco, Caitlin, Sherloque, and Ralph try to track down Caitlin's father Thomas.

episodes.name: The Icicle Cometh
episodes.summary: Caitlin is reunited with her long-lost father, but Cisco suspects that not everything is at it seems. Ralph teams up with Cecile to learn who was injured the night of the Enlightenment by the satellite crash, and Iris, Nora, and Sherloque try to track down the core piece of the satellite.

episodes.name: O Come, All Ye Thankful
episodes.summary: A new weather-wielding villain appears in Central City, and demands that Team Flash hands Mark Mardon over to her. Nora reveals her unresolved feelings for losing Barry in the future, and the origin of Cicada is revealed.

episodes.name: What's Past Is Prologue
episodes.summary: To defeat Cicada, Nora comes up with a plan to assemble the necessary components from discarded villain items in the past and hide them in the present. Barry travels back in time to recover the three components, and reluctantly takes Nora with him.

episodes.name: Elseworlds, Part 1
episodes.summary: Oliver and Barry discover that they've swapped bodies. To find someone who can recognize them for who they are, they travel to Earth-38 to get Kara's help. Before they can solve the mystery of the mind-swap, the heroes have to take down a new menace: AMAZO, a robot with all of their powers.

episodes.name: The Flash & The Furious
episodes.summary: When a new meta-tech villain--Silver Ghost--helps Jocelyn Jackam escape, Nora wonders if Jocelyn wants to reform as she claims. Meanwhile, Barry is forced to stay in the pipeline after a confrontation with Silver Ghost, and Cisco discovers a possible meta-human cure.

episodes.name: Seeing Red
episodes.summary: Cicada renews his murder spree against metas and cripples XS, causing Flash to lose control. Meanwhile, Killer Frost worries that she'll be destroyed by the cure Caitlin is working on, and Sherloque continues trying to unravel the mystery behind Nora's journal.

episodes.name: Memorabilia
episodes.summary: Sherloque uses a memory machine to try and revive Grace, and Nora ends up trapped in the girl's memories. Barry and Iris go in to save their daughter, and see her memories of a future Iris. Meanwhile, Ralph tricks Cisco into a night out.

episodes.name: Goldfaced
episodes.summary: To find a device that will let them administer the meta cure to Cicada, Barry and Ralph go undercover to get it from a black market arms dealer. Meanwhile, Iris decides to go looking for Cicada on her own, and Sherloque meets a woman after his own heart.

episodes.name: Cause and XS
episodes.summary: With Barry out of contact in the Speed Force, XS witnesses Cicada kill Killer Frost and tries to travel back in time to stop the outcome... and a different teammate dies with her every attempt.

episodes.name: King Shark vs. Gorilla Grodd
episodes.summary: The team need a meta to test the cure on, and settle on King Shark. Grodd escapes from ARGUS captivity and initiates his own plan to rule Central City... and then the world.

episodes.name: Failure Is an Orphan
episodes.summary: Barry tries to find the words to convince Cicada to take the cure that Team Flash has developed. Joe and Cecile join forces to question Ambres, and Eobard warns Nora that a new timeline is coming.

episodes.name: Time Bomb
episodes.summary: Team Flash discovers the nature of the new Cicada when they find a time sphere that is a future duplicate of Eobard's. They also find out that Cicada II is going after the meta that she believes killed her parents, while Sherloque reaches the conclusion of his investigation.

episodes.name: Godspeed
episodes.summary: To learn why Nora joined forces with Eobard, Team Flash reads her journal. They discover that in 2049, Eobard was the only person who was honest with Nora, and taught her how to use her powers.

episodes.name: Snow Pack
episodes.summary: Iris and Ralph travel to the future to find Nora and confront Eobard, while Barry, Joe, and Sherloque deal with Icicle's newest scheme.

episodes.name: Gone Rogue
episodes.summary: Back from the future, Nora gathers a group of Rogues to steal meta-tech. Meanwhile, Cicada II steals Cisco's metahuman cure, and Barry considers whether he's a good parent.

episodes.name: The Girl with the Red Lightning
episodes.summary: Cicada II assembles the part to build an atomizer that will release the meta-human killing virus, and Nora tries to use her psychic connection to the villain to find out what she's going to do next despite the risk.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.summary: Barry must choose between stopping Cicada or releasing Eobard. Nora and Cisco make choices of their own as they face the crisis upon them.

episodes.name: Into the Void
episodes.summary: Team Flash face multiple Godspeeds, but focus on their personal issues: Barry and Iris are grieving over losing Nora, Caitlin is unable to summon Killer Frost, and Cisco deals with being Vibe no longer. However, they're forced to set aside their concerns when a black hole appears at seemingly random locations across Central City, threatening to destroy the metropolis.

episodes.name: A Flash of the Lightning
episodes.summary: Barry travels to Earth-3 to find a way to see the future where the Monitor claims he dies. Meanwhile, Cecile is torn between her powers and her career when she uses her empathic powers to discover that a young metahuman is innocent of murder.

episodes.name: Dead Man Running
episodes.summary: Barry recruits Ramsey to help him stop a mutated Mitch, but Frost doesn't trust the doctor. Ralph's mother Debbie is accused of murder, and another Harrison arrives on Earth-1.

episodes.name: There Will Be Blood
episodes.summary: Nash comes to Barry and Cisco and ask them to build something for him in return for his getting them something they want. Meanwhile, Ralph stops investigating the Dearbon case, and Ramsey gains the key to curing his HLH.

episodes.name: Kiss Kiss Breach Breach
episodes.summary: While Barry and Iris take a vacation, Cisco is suspected of killing Gypsy and her father comes looking for revenge.

episodes.name: License to Elongate
episodes.summary: Barry helps Raph investigate Sue Dearbon's disappearance hoping to get him back to Central City for a surprise. Nash recruits Allegra to help him, while Cecile gives Chester some advice.

episodes.name: The Last Temptation of Barry Allen, Pt. 1
episodes.summary: With Crisis only two days away, Barry faces a crisis from within when Ramsey infects him with his black blood. Meanwhile, Iris, Allegra, and Kamila investigate the secret organization Ralph and Barry saw at the gala.

episodes.name: The Last Temptation of Barry Allen, Pt. 2
episodes.summary: While Bloodwork and Dark Flash infect Central City, Cisco tries to come up with a way to stop them. Joe is badly injured, and Iris has faith that the real Barry is still alive somewhere within the twisted monstrosity of the dark speedster.

episodes.name: Crisis on Infinite Earths: Part Three
episodes.summary: Flash, Killer Frost, and a newly repowered Vibe track down the Anti-Monitor's weapon of destruction and meet an electrifying new hero. Ray, Ralph, and Iris go to recruit the Paragon of Humanity, while Constantine helps Mia and Diggle recover Oliver's soul.

episodes.name: Marathon
episodes.summary: After The Citizen prints an explosive story, Iris's life is threatened. Refusing to hide from those that are attacking her, Iris sets out to expose a dangerous organization. Meanwhile, Barry must face the consequences of the Crisis and fulfill Oliver Queen's wish for him.

episodes.name: Love Is a Battlefield
episodes.summary: Barry and Iris plan a romantic dinner for Valentine's Day but their evening is interrupted by an old foe ‚Äì Amunet. Meanwhile, Frost gets into the holiday spirit and attempts to help Allegra reconnect with an old love.

episodes.name: A Girl Named Sue
episodes.summary: After months of searching for Sue Dearbon, Ralph gets a lead on her whereabouts and finally comes face to face with his missing client. However, Sue refuses to return home to her family, and instead, takes Ralph on a daring adventure. Iris faces a new challenge while Barry considers a potentially dangerous request from a trusted source.

episodes.name: Grodd Friended Me
episodes.summary: Feeling overwhelmed with all the changes since Crisis, Barry conducts an experiment that goes awry and puts him directly in Gorilla Grodd's path. Expecting the worst, Barry is surprised when Grodd asks for his help. Unfortunately for both The Flash and Grodd, things get worse when another villain appears ‚Äì Solovar. Meanwhile, Iris works with Eva to escape the Mirrorverse.

episodes.name: Death of the Speed Force
episodes.summary: Kid Flash returns to Central City with a Zen attitude and new tricks up his sleeve. While thrilled to see his family again, Wally confides to Barry that he returned because he thinks there is something wrong with the speed force. Meanwhile, Cisco returns from his fact-finding mission across Earth-Prime.

episodes.name: The Exorcism of Nash Wells
episodes.summary: The Flash takes on a dangerous new meta named Sunshine. Cisco sets out to help Nash.

episodes.name: So Long and Goodnight
episodes.summary: After Black Hole hires Rag Doll to kill Joe, Singh suggests he go into Witness Protection but Joe refuses to stop investigating Carver. While investigating Carver with Cisco, Ralph runs into Sue. Iris becomes suspicious of Eva.

episodes.name: Liberation
episodes.summary: After recent events, Barry takes a closer look at his life with Iris. Eva makes a bold move.

episodes.name: Pay the Piper
episodes.summary: When Godspeed returns, Barry turns to Hartley Rathaway for help; things get tense quickly after Barry realizes one of the changes from Crisis is that The Flash and Pied Piper are now enemies; Iris tries to escape the Mirrorverse.

episodes.name: Success Is Assured
episodes.summary: Barry considers a risky plan to save Iris from the Mirrorverse. Ralph attempts to stop Sue from making a grave mistake that could destroy her life.

episodes.name: Truth Be Told
episodes.summary: Sydney Bristow is a college student who leads a double life: she works for shadowy government agency called SD-6 which is supposed to be a covert branch of the CIA and reports to Arvin Sloan. Recently engaged, she tells her boyfriend, Danny Hecht, the truth. The next day, he is murdered. Later, Sydney's father, Jack Bristow, tells the truth: he is a double agent for the real CIA, as SD-6 is a renegade agency who allegedly killed Sydney's fianc√©. Sydney must make a decision which will haunt her for the rest of her life. Sydney's partner in the field, Marcus Dixon, is also unaware about his true alliances as is SD-6's tech expert, the socially awkward Marshall Flinkman. Sydney's friends, the headstrong Francine, and the ambitious journalist Will Tippin are also unaware about Sydney's double life, until Will becomes inquisitive about Sydney's well-being following her fianc√©'s murder.

episodes.name: So It Begins
episodes.summary: In her new role as a double agent for the CIA, Sydney is intent on destroying SD-6 within weeks.

episodes.name: Parity
episodes.summary: Sydney and Dixon go to Madrid to steal a lockbox containing a sketch with what appears to be a digital code drawn by a 15th century seer, Milo Rambaldi.

episodes.name: A Broken Heart
episodes.summary: Sydney and Anna memorize a code written by Rambaldi. Sydney and Dixon are sent to investigate a plot to eliminate the United Commerce Organization.

episodes.name: Doppelg√§nger
episodes.summary: Will tells Francie that he's been investigating the death of Danny. Sydney learns from Vaughn that her father may also be working for the FBI.

episodes.name: Reckoning
episodes.summary: Sydney forms the opinion the Jack's suspicious activities led to the death of her mother 20 years earlier, creating a deeper tension between them.

episodes.name: Color-Blind
episodes.summary: Sydney learns about Shepard's involvement in her past. Sloane confronts the Alliance about the CIA bug, and they conclude that SD-6 has been moled.

episodes.name: Time Will Tell
episodes.summary: Sydney travels to Oxford to steal an ancient clock connected to the Rambaldi mystery.

episodes.name: Mea Culpa
episodes.summary: Sydney is scared, as she thinks that Dixon may have heard her talking to the CIA.

episodes.name: Spirit
episodes.summary: Jack must save Sydney when Sloane orders her to be tortured and killed after she is suspected as the mole. Sydney tells Vaughn about her time at SD-6.

episodes.name: The Confession
episodes.summary: After Jack saves Sydney during a mission, she discovers that he was responsible for the deaths of many CIA agents, complicating her feelings for him.

episodes.name: The Box (Part 1)
episodes.summary: A group of heavily-armed intruders sneak into SD-6 and take control of the building.

episodes.name: The Box (Part 2)
episodes.summary: Sydney discovers a note left for her by her father, explaining the dire predicament: opening the SD-6 vault would trigger a fatal explosion.

episodes.name: The Coup
episodes.summary: Sydney and Dixon travel to Las Vegas to try and track down the group that nearly destroyed SD-6.

episodes.name: Page 47
episodes.summary: Sydney and Dixon are dispatched to Tunisia. A Rambaldi manuscript is being held on a yacht, and their mission is to retrieve it before Sark gets it.

episodes.name: The Prophecy
episodes.summary: The Department of Special Research inquires about Sydney's connection to the Rambaldi notebook.

episodes.name: Q&A
episodes.summary: While being questioned by the FBI about her ties to Rambaldi, Sydney makes a shocking discovery that may unravel the mysterious 500-year-old prophecy.

episodes.name: Masquerade
episodes.summary: Sydney is reunited with Noah Hicks, an SD-6 agent she dated five years ago.

episodes.name: Snowman
episodes.summary: Vaughn confirms that K-Directorate has hired an assassin, known as "The Snowman" for his favored use of an ice pick as a weapon, to take out Khasinau.

episodes.name: The Solution
episodes.summary: Sydney and Vaughn meet with Mr Sark hoping to catch Khasinau, but Sydney's cover is endangered when an SD-6 agent is sent to stop the trade.

episodes.name: Rendezvous
episodes.summary: Sydney and Dixon must go to a Paris nightclub, where Sark will deliver the ampule to Khasinau. Dixon is to steal pages of a Rambaldi manuscript.

episodes.name: Almost Thirty Years
episodes.summary: Vaughn and Sydney must destroy a Rambaldi artifact to save Will. Jack makes a deal with Mr Sark, and The Alliance decides the fate of Emily Sloane.

episodes.name: The Enemy Walks In
episodes.summary: Sydney finds herself face-to-face with her mother, Irina Derevko.

episodes.name: Trust Me
episodes.summary: Sydney begins to question whether her mother is trying to help her or trying to get her killed.

episodes.name: Cipher
episodes.summary: Sydney must stay one step ahead of Mr Sark in retrieving a crucial piece of intel. Jack must face Sydney's mother while Will meets Vaughn.

episodes.name: Dead Drop
episodes.summary: Sydney's dealings with her mother lead Jack to take drastic measures to ensure his daughter's safety. Meanwhile Will is confronted by a mysterious woman about resurrecting his story on SD-6.

episodes.name: The Indicator
episodes.summary: Sydney uncovers a chilling secret while on a case. Vaughn suspects Jack of setting up Sydney's mother to take the fall.

episodes.name: Salvation
episodes.summary: Jack does what it takes to earn back Sydney's trust, while Sydney and Vaughn may have been exposed to a deadly virus.

episodes.name: The Counteragent
episodes.summary: Sydney must make a deal with her nemesis, Mr Sark, in order to find a cure for an ailing Vaughn.

episodes.name: Passage (Part 1)
episodes.summary: The Bristow family goes undercover on a deadly mission and Mr Sark joins forces with SD-6.

episodes.name: Passage (Part 2)
episodes.summary: While continuing the first family mission together, Sydney and Jack learn where Irina's loyalties lie.

episodes.name: The Abduction
episodes.summary: Alliance counterintelligence head Ariana Kane is investigating the disappearance of Emily Sloane. Marshall is sent on his first mission.

episodes.name: A Higher Echelon
episodes.summary: Marshall's life is placed in mortal danger. Ariana Kane has her sights set on Jack as the prime suspect in the disapearence of Sloane's wife.

episodes.name: The Getaway
episodes.summary: Ariana Kane tracks Sydney in order to catch Jack. Sydney and Vaughns covers may have been compromised after sharing a romantic dinner together in France.

episodes.name: Phase One
episodes.summary: Sydney and Jack scramble to get information on the new Director of SD-6, who is appointed when Sloane goes missing.

episodes.name: Double Agent
episodes.summary: CIA Agent Lennox's identity is called into question by Sydney, Jack and Vaughn after his deep cover mission is blown.

episodes.name: A Free Agent
episodes.summary: Sydney thinks about leaving the agency. Sloane kidnaps a scientist to help him piece together the mysterious Rambaldi device.

episodes.name: Firebomb
episodes.summary: Sloane discovers the powers of a mysterious Rambaldi device. Sydney senses that Francie is keeping secrets.

episodes.name: A Dark Turn
episodes.summary: Sydney begins to lose trust in Vaughn when she discovers the he is under investigation by the Agency.

episodes.name: Truth Takes Time
episodes.summary: Sydney faces off with her mother, while Emily Sloane must decide whether to side with her husband or betray him.

episodes.name: Endgame
episodes.summary: Sydney defies her father in her attempt to rescue a kidnapped scientist, while Sloane, seeking revenge, becomes more dangerous than ever. Meanwhile, Allison manipulates an unsuspecting Will for his agency connections.

episodes.name: Countdown
episodes.summary: The Agency acts to stop an apocalyptic event prophesized by Rambaldi. Vaughn questions Dixon's state of mind.

episodes.name: Second Double
episodes.summary: Sydney begins to question Will's identity when he's arrested for espionage, under suspicion of being a double. Meanwhile Sark and Irina plot to recover the Di Regno heart, and Sloane makes Jack a business proposal.

episodes.name: The Telling
episodes.summary: Sydney confronts her mother, who reveals her true motivation. Will struggles to figure out who's behind his set-up.

episodes.name: The Two
episodes.summary: After waking up in Hong Kong, Sydney tries to remember what has happened in the past two years, and discovers that Vaughn is married.

episodes.name: Succession
episodes.summary: Jack confronts Sloane, doubting his redemption and blaming him for Sydney's disappearence.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.summary: A fireball drops from the sky, devastating Moscow's Gorky Park.

episodes.name: A Missing Link
episodes.summary: A team steals four vials of Ebola from a French epidemiology lab. Lauren and Sydney question Laszlo Bogdan, a team member who was infected and captured.

episodes.name: Repercussions
episodes.summary: Sydney tells Jack to activate the transmitter that she put on Vaughn. Sydney breaks into Simon Walker's room only to find bio-weapon gone and sold to Sark.

episodes.name: The Nemesis
episodes.summary: Sloane tells Sydney that intel about the Covenant's next move is encoded in an image of the Vatican on a website.

episodes.name: Prelude
episodes.summary: Sydney wakes from a nightmare in which she sees an angel-like figure, then pulls tubes from her mysterious scar. Shaken, she asks a CIA psychiatrist about the memory-retrieval process.

episodes.name: Breaking Point
episodes.summary: Now in Lindsey's custody, Sydney is imprisoned and tortured at Camp Williams, a secret NSC detention facility.

episodes.name: Conscious
episodes.summary: Hiding out in a warehouse, the team devises a plan to frame The Covenant for Sydney's extraction.

episodes.name: Remnants
episodes.summary: Sydney tells Jack about a dream involving Will. Jack advises her to contact Will, who is in the witness protection program.

episodes.name: Full Disclosure
episodes.summary: Kendall tells Sydney the truth about her two missing years.

episodes.name: Crossings
episodes.summary: In a North Korean jail, Sydney passionately kisses Vaughn before they are led, in chains, to a firing line.

episodes.name: After Six
episodes.summary: At the CIA, the team discusses info gleaned from Lisenker, a Covenant defector.

episodes.name: Blowback
episodes.summary: Dixon presents the team with a new mission: The Shining Sword, a Filipino terrorist organization, has acquired a next-generation bomb called a plasma charge, which they're shipping to Europe.

episodes.name: Facade
episodes.summary: Daniel Ryan, a freelance bomb maker whose bombs are impossible to diffuse, destroys a bank in Belfast as a calling card to The Covenant.

episodes.name: Taken
episodes.summary: Senator Reed, Lauren's father, arrives to oversee Sark's interrogation. He tells Jack that they must learn the identity of Sark's partner in The Covenant.

episodes.name: The Frame
episodes.summary: Vaughn and Sydney travel to mexico city searching for the key to open the Rambaldi box.

episodes.name: Unveiled
episodes.summary: Dixon explains to the team that a computer worm, originating in Berlin, has targeted hospitals, laboratories and universities. They believe it's a Covenant attack.

episodes.name: Hourglass
episodes.summary: Sark takes a manuscript regarding The Passenger, called The Restoration.

episodes.name: Blood Ties
episodes.summary: Sloane reveals that he found a Rambaldi text that contained a formula for an elixir that would allow The Passenger to channel a message from Rambaldi.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.summary: Sloane takes the notes that an entranced Nadia has written and pins them to a board, where they form some kind of diagram.

episodes.name: Resurrection
episodes.summary: When the mission to kill Vaughn's wife ends up putting Vaughn in the hospital, Sydney decides it's time to kill Lauren. Nadia is forced to decide whether she can trust her father.

episodes.name: Authorized Personnel Only (Part 1)
episodes.summary: Sydney quits the CIA and joins a Black Ops unit, "Authorized Personnel Only," along with Jack, Vaughn, Dixon, Marshall, Nadia and Sloane.

episodes.name: Authorized Personnel Only (Part 2)
episodes.summary: What Sydney found out in Wittenburg may endanger her relationship with Jack.

episodes.name: The Awful Truth
episodes.summary: Sloane says Valta, a computer that will revolutionize info gathering, was stolen from the NSA headquarters by Martin Bishop, who will deliver it to a german terrorist group.

episodes.name: Ice
episodes.summary: Sydney and Vaughn are sent on a mission by APO to obtain a sample of Ice 5, a weapon that can freeze a person to death.

episodes.name: Welcome to Liberty Village
episodes.summary: Posing as a Chechen couple, Sydney and Vaughn infiltrate a training camp run by the October Contingent.

episodes.name: Nocturne
episodes.summary: After being infected by a hallucinogen, Sydney starts to lose touch with reality.

episodes.name: D√©tente
episodes.summary: Nadia and Sydney go undercover as wealthy, irresponsible young heiresses to uncover the whereabouts of a deadly chemical.

episodes.name: Echoes
episodes.summary: Sloane steps down as director of his task force and gives Jack full authority over the next assignment, which involves Anna Espinosa, Sydney's old foe.

episodes.name: A Man of His Word
episodes.summary: While Nadia is in a coma, Sark is taken into APO to help them infiltrate Cadmus Revolutionary Front and retrieve the bomb.

episodes.name: The Index
episodes.summary: Dixon enlists Sydney's to help him prove Sloane is double-crossing the CIA and using APO to steal the Blackwell Index, a master blackmail list.

episodes.name: The Road Home
episodes.summary: Sydney must protect the life of a civilian she unintentionally put in danger.

episodes.name: The Orphan
episodes.summary: Nadia puts the ones she loves in danger when she forgets to tell them about her criminal past.

episodes.name: Tuesday
episodes.summary: When a mission does not go well, Sydney is attacked and her life is put in danger. The only one who can save Sydney is Marshall.

episodes.name: Nightingale
episodes.summary: Jack agrees to Sydney's request for clearence on files relating to Vaughn's father.

episodes.name: Pandora
episodes.summary: Dixon is shot by a masked gunman. The shooter approaches and takes off his mask, revealing Vaughn.

episodes.name: Another Mister Sloane
episodes.summary: In Poland, men posing as airport guards abduct Professor Sinclair, a nuclear physicist. She wakes up bound in a dark room and is greeted by a man impersonating Arvin Sloane.

episodes.name: A Clean Conscience
episodes.summary: The APO team watches footage of an explosion at an Indonesian embassy in Copenhagen that killed 15 people, the work of terrorists headed by Milos Kradic.

episodes.name: Mirage
episodes.summary: Sydney tells Vaughn that she hasn't seen her father in two days. They go to his apartment and find a notebook with recent records of Jack's vitals.

episodes.name: In Dreams...
episodes.summary: The Sloane imposter is questioned about the Rambaldi orchid, but first the real Sloane must remember a painful memory.

episodes.name: The Descent
episodes.summary: A tactical group infiltrates the DSR and steals the Rambaldi artifacts. Sophia says goodbye to Nadia and Sydney, telling them that the Lisbon police confirmed that it is safe.

episodes.name: Search and Rescue
episodes.summary: A giant version of the Circumference/Mueller device is found floating over a city in Russia, making the citizens insane. Sydney, Nadia and Jack search for Irina.

episodes.name: Before the Flood
episodes.summary: Jack, Sydney, Vaughn and Irina parachute into Sovogda, trying to dismantle a giant red ball turning people into zombies.

episodes.name: Prophet Five
episodes.summary: After learning that the man she has known as Michael Vaughn is under investigation and suspected of being a double agent, Sydney begins to question whether their business and personal relationship over the years had all been a lie.
Sydney visits Sloane in his jail cell. Jack meets with Thomas Grace, a new agent he is recruiting into APO.

episodes.name: The Shed
episodes.summary: The team interrogates Rachel, a hacker working for Dean, as Sydney realizes they have a lot of similarities.

episodes.name: Mockingbird
episodes.summary: A shipping crane lifts Sydney's car hundreds of feet off the ground. Sydney answers her phone - it's Gordon Dean saying he wants Mockingbird.

episodes.name: Out of the Box
episodes.summary: Sloane asks to be reinstated in APO so he can find a cure for Nadia. Syd and Tom meet Renee in Marseilles and return to her loft, where the now revived but disoriented man from the box suprises them.

episodes.name: Solo
episodes.summary: Sydney must guide a nervous and pensive Rachel on her first solo mission. Sloane must decide whether or not to betray the trust he's recently earned with APO.

episodes.name: Fait Accompli
episodes.summary: Sloane confesses to Jack and Sydney that he had been working with Dean, as they come up with a plan to trap him.

episodes.name: Bob
episodes.summary: Unaware of who the other really is, Rachel and Sark fall for each other while both undercover.

episodes.name: The Horizon
episodes.summary: Hoping to gain information from her, Prophet Five capture Sydney and makes her relive moments of her past with Vaughn.

episodes.name: S.O.S.
episodes.summary: Marshall recovers an emergency transmission from Sydney but it's deleted by a Langley insider before he could listen to it - meaning Prophet Five has infiltrated the CIA.

episodes.name: Maternal Instinct
episodes.summary: Irina returns and claiming to want to help, convinces Jack and Sydney to take her on a mission to retrieve The Horizon.

episodes.name: There's Only One Sydney Bristow
episodes.summary: As part of a plan to bring Sydney back into the field for Prophet Five's own purposes, Peyton has Anna Espinova kidnap Will Tippin.

episodes.name: 30 Seconds
episodes.summary: Sloane is distressed to learn that Prophet Five's cure for Nadia is just as likely to kill her. Meanwhile, the search for Anna Espinosa continues, Rambaldi's prophetic Page 47 resurfaces, and Sydney offers Renee a job at APO.

episodes.name: I See Dead People
episodes.summary: Sydney must beat arch-nemesis Anna Espinosa to the punch when a mysterious chip found planted in Renee is tied to Vaughn. Meanwhile, Sloane struggles with ghostly visions while working for Prophet Five.

episodes.name: No Hard Feelings
episodes.summary: Sydney must stay undercover and partner with Sark to track down Rambaldi's final clue before Prophet Five finds it. Meanwhile, Vaughn sees daughter Isabelle for the first time, and Rachel discovers Tom's secret.

episodes.name: Reprisal
episodes.summary: Sloane takes Marshall and Rachel hostage in order to discover a crucial clue to Rambaldi's ultimate endgame, as Sydney, Vaughn and APO race to stop him.

episodes.name: All the Time in the World
episodes.summary: Sydney and Jack must find a way to keep Sloane and Irina from putting their deadly plan into action.

episodes.name: Gay Discount
episodes.summary: In the series premiere, Mr. Kim decides to offer a store discount to gay customers. Meanwhile, Umma tries to find a hip Christian Korean boyfriend for Janet.

episodes.name: Janet's Photos
episodes.summary: When Janet's photos start getting attention from admirers, Appa tries to prove he's a better photographer. Meanwhile, Jung decides to apply for a promotion at the car rental, to the dismay of Kimchee and Umma, though for different reasons.

episodes.name: Ddong Chim
episodes.summary: Jung draws the wrong kind of attention from his boss when he gives Kimchee a Korean wedgie at work. Mr. Kim commissions Janet's friend Gerald to take his photo instead of asking Janet.

episodes.name: Frank & Nayoung
episodes.summary: Mr. Kim is frustrated with Frank the repairman; Janet's cousin Nayoung visits from Korea, challenging Janet's sense of what it means to be ‚ÄòKorean.

episodes.name: Wingman
episodes.summary: Mr. Chin asks Mr. Kim to be his wingman; Janet asks Jung to fix a leaky pipe, but an intruder interrupts the repair.

episodes.name: Rude Kid
episodes.summary: Mr. Kim scolds Janet's professor's kid; Jung discovers Kimchee's method to make extra money.

episodes.name: Hapkido
episodes.summary: Janet is taking a Hapkido class, but Mr. Kim questions her teacher's techniques; Jung runs into an old flame.

episodes.name: Service
episodes.summary: Mr. and Mrs. Kim's relationship is tested when Mr. Kim offers free stuff at the store to the attractive new female pastor. Janet dates Jung's friend Alex and Jung pretends to be cool with it.

episodes.name: Best Before
episodes.summary: Mr. Kim tries to prove to Janet that best before dates are meaningless. Mrs. Kim tries not to be embarrassed by her children at the church bazaar.

episodes.name: Janet's New Job
episodes.summary: Janet is sick of working for free and looks for a new job, finding one at Handy Car Rental; Appa hires Gerald to work in the store.

episodes.name: Handyman
episodes.summary: Mr. Kim fixes a broken toilet for Kimchee; Jung hides out with Shannon; when Edwin drops by, Janet believes there's more to his relationship with Mrs. Kim.

episodes.name: Appa's Lump
episodes.summary: Mr. Kim finds a lump on his back; Shannon brings Jung to a work event.

episodes.name: Family Singing Contest
episodes.summary: Before Janet can reveal her big news, she must survive the family singing festival at church; Mr. Kim gets attention for his new SUV.

episodes.name: Janet's Roommate
episodes.summary: Appa and Umma encourage Janet to stay home when her plans to move hit a snag; Kimchee tells Jung to make a move on Shannon.

episodes.name: Business Award
episodes.summary: An award comes between App and Umma; Shannon begins biking to work; Janet and Gerald have their first argument as roommates.

episodes.name: House Guest
episodes.summary: After a night with Janet and her college friends, Jung is worried he might not be that bright. Also: Appa and Umma have an awkward encounter with Pastor Nina.

episodes.name: Cardboard Jung
episodes.summary: Umma gets Jung into the store; Janet's cousin returns.

episodes.name: Date Night
episodes.summary: Appa feels pressured to make his date night with Umma more special; Jung looks online to replace Kimchee's sneakers.

episodes.name: Resting Place
episodes.summary: A money-saving scheme comes back to haunt Appa and Umma; Janet's bedroom habits make Gerald uncomfortable; Jung does damage control after being upstaged.

episodes.name: Sneak Attack
episodes.summary: Appa wants in on Umma's side business; Janet assumes a new identity; Jung and Kimchee get a new freezer.

episodes.name: Silent Auction
episodes.summary: Umma has her heart set on a coat at the auction; Jung accuses Shannon of acting unprofessional; Janet's big payday gets foiled.

episodes.name: New TV
episodes.summary: Appa and Umma donate to a new Canadian family; a photography lecturer notices Janet; Kimchee worries about Jung stealing his girlfriend.

episodes.name: Janet's Boyfriend
episodes.summary: Janet tries to keep her relationship from Appa and Umma; Jung and Kimchee can't agree about their house party.

episodes.name: Good Neighbours
episodes.summary: Appa and Umma meet their new neighbour; Jung starts a new work romance; Janet doesn't like how sweet Gerald's new girlfriend is.

episodes.name: Appa's First Text
episodes.summary: Appa inherits a smartphone; Umma discovers a pest in the store; Kimchee tries to help Janet with her F.O.M.O.; Jung tries to reconnect with a girl.

episodes.name: Handy Graduation
episodes.summary: Umma wants the family to celebrate Jung getting his GED; Janet gets tired of being the good one; Jung struggles to tell Shannon about a new opportunity.

episodes.name: New Appa-liance
episodes.summary: Umma finally convinces Appa to get a new dishwasher, but Appa tries to exploit a store's price matching policy; Janet changes her name to make herself more unique; Jung treads carefully with Shannon in trying to get his job back at the new, merged Handy.

episodes.name: Cutie Pie
episodes.summary: Appa tries to convince Umma that he's still attractive; Jung returns to Handy; Gerald's girlfriend makes herself at home.

episodes.name: Open Kimunication
episodes.summary: Appa and Umma unwittingly end up in marriage counseling; Jung learns more about Shannon's boyfriend than he bargained for; Janet debates whether or not to share a potential mentor with Gerald.

episodes.name: Thy Neighbour's Wifi
episodes.summary: Appa tests neighbourly boundaries when he tries to get cheap wifi. Umma forces Janet to do a questionable reading at Church and Jung hits it off with Shannon's friend, Katie.

episodes.name: Army Spoon
episodes.summary: Appa unintentionally becomes the star of Gerald's award-winning photo essay. Umma realizes her family doesn't trust her in emergency situations. Janet makes a social faux pas at an exclusive restaurant.

episodes.name: The Kim Cup
episodes.summary: Appa and Jung try out the old family ping pong table; Umma's feelings get hurt when Janet refuses to hang out with her; a gift basket causes problems.

episodes.name: Appanoon Delight
episodes.summary: Appa and Umma search for ways to spice up their love life; Kimchee preps for his first presentation.

episodes.name: To Him It May Concern
episodes.summary: Kimchee's mom visits, and Jung looks forward to seeing her; Umma takes over sign duty; Gerald asks Appa for a reference letter, but Janet intervenes.

episodes.name: Blabber Talker
episodes.summary: Appa and Umma invite their friends to go on vacation, accidentally; Janet accepts a photography job; Jung takes teasing too far.

episodes.name: Elephant in the Room
episodes.summary: Janet and Umma's fight puts Appa in the middle; Jung and Shannon offer conflicting advice.

episodes.name: Appanticitis
episodes.summary: Appa's honesty gets him into trouble; when Janet takes Gerald to the hospital, she runs into an old friend; Jung accidentally books two people to audition with him for his favourite reality show.

episodes.name: Hit 'n' Fun
episodes.summary: Umma and Appa accidentally damage a car; Janet finds out that Gerald isn't as loyal as she had thought; Jung is concerned that his birthday message is too personal.

episodes.name: Lord of the Ring
episodes.summary: Umma tries to hide the fact that she lost something valuable; Jung threatens to ruin Janet's chance with a yoga instructor; Shannon and Kimchee win a BBQ.

episodes.name: The Trollop
episodes.summary: Janet grapples with the fallout of Raj's canceled engagement and faces an awkward night out.

episodes.name: Couch Surfing
episodes.summary: While Appa is reluctant to have a houseguest, Umma ends up having problems with their visitor.

episodes.name: The Help
episodes.summary: Umma is mistaken for a server at a school event; Appa takes up math tutoring to prove his prowess.

episodes.name: Happy Ummaversary
episodes.summary: Janet is planning to get the Kim family together, but it might be too much for Jung and Appa.

episodes.name: Thinkin' 'Bout Inkin'
episodes.summary: Janet considers getting a new tattoo; Umma and Appa learn about some juicy gossip.

episodes.name: Soccer Dad
episodes.summary: Appa becomes Jung's soccer coach; Shannon forces a birthday party on Stacie.

episodes.name: Beacon of Truth
episodes.summary: A lie from Janet's past hurts Appa's feelings; Shannon and Jung struggle with workplace dating.

episodes.name: Chammo!
episodes.summary: Janet is commissioned to take portraits of Shannon's cats. Umma entrusts Jung to pick Appa up from the dentist but things don't go as planned.

episodes.name: Which Witch is Which
episodes.summary: Umma reevaluates her role as a mother; Appa comes into money and tries to do a good thing with it; Jung and Shannon discover they have different concepts of what is sexy.

episodes.name: In the Bedroom
episodes.summary: Appa and Umma come up with a new sleeping arrangement; Jung pursues a new career and tries to get Janet involved; Shannon and Kimchee discover a new, slightly terrifying side of Terence.

episodes.name: Birds of a Feather
episodes.summary: Jung shows Shannon his nurturing side while Chelsea and Gerald get in the way of Janet's summer plans; Appa is invited to lead a business seminar but is forced to share the spotlight.

episodes.name: Knife Strife
episodes.summary: Umma believes she has discovered a murder weapon, as Janet realizes she and Nathan have nothing in common; at Handy, Kimchee struggles to fit in with the other regional managers.

episodes.name: Bon Voyage
episodes.summary: Appa and Umma's plans for the future push Appa out of his comfort zone; Janet gets an internship overseas, and Jung and Kimchee explore new living arrangements.

episodes.name: Pailaka
episodes.summary: Upon returning to Hawaii to investigate his father's murder, decorated Naval officer Steve McGarrett is recruited by the Governor to head up an elite new police task force - his rules, her backing, no red tape. Their first case involves tracking a weapons dealer connected to McGarrett's father's murder.

episodes.name: Ohana
episodes.summary: Following the violent abduction of an ex-NSA cyber-terrorism expert in the middle of downtown Waikiki, Five-0 must race to rescue the man, and prevent a breach of national security.

episodes.name: Malama Ka Aina
episodes.summary: When an escalating gang war spills into the stands of the local high school football game, injuring several bystanders and killing a gang leader, Five-0 uncovers an unlikely partnership between Samoan gangs and a mainland mob.

episodes.name: Lanakila
episodes.summary: Five-0 is tasked with tracking down a violent convict after he breaks from an Island prison in search of his stolen money and kidnaps a young couple on vacation in Waikiki. Meanwhile, McGarrett's estranged sister, Mary, arrives from the mainland.

episodes.name: Nalowale
episodes.summary: When the teenage daughter of the U.S. Ambassador to the Philippines is found dead off the coast of Waikiki, the Governor tasks Five-0 with finding her sister, who was also abducted.

episodes.name: Ko'olauloa
episodes.summary: When the CEO of a hugely successful surf company is murdered, Kono revisits her past while Five-0 is thrown headlong into the varied but interconnected worlds of North Shore surfing.

episodes.name: Ho'apono
episodes.summary: When a Navy SEAL, who's on the run for a murder he swears he didn't commit, takes hostages and safe haven aboard the U.S.S. Missouri memorial battleship, McGarrett must use every SEAL skill in his arsenal to diffuse the situation.

episodes.name: Mana'o
episodes.summary: Hawaiian luau turns into a nightmare when the body of a dead cop, who turns out to be Danny's ex-partner from the Honolulu P.D., is found in the barbeque pit. Five-0's dogged investigation into the murder matches them against Internal Affairs, dirty cops and Hawaii's most powerful cocaine cartel.

episodes.name: Po'ipu
episodes.summary: When a member of the security detail for an upcoming Aid Summit is murdered before he can reveal the details of an assassination plot, Five-0 is brought in to investigate the murder and protect the target, a ruthless dictator.

episodes.name: Heihei
episodes.summary: ......"Heihei*" - Five-0 is baffled when a highly skilled ring of thieves pulls off the heist of an armored car, killing two security guards but leaving the money behind. Their only lead in the case requires Danny to reluctantly ask his ex-wife for a favor.

episodes.name: Palekaiko
episodes.summary: While Five-0 investigates the murder of a man on his honeymoon and his wife's abduction, Medical Examiner Dr. Max Bergman recognizes uncanny similarities to a series of unsolved homicides from a year ago.

episodes.name: Hana 'a'a Makehewa
episodes.summary: It's Christmas in Hawaii, but instead of celebrating, Five-0 is negotiating a hostage situation when the man who killed McGarrett's father resurfaces. The murderer, Victor Hesse, threatens to detonate an explosive that he's strapped to Chin Ho's chest.

episodes.name: Ke Kinohi
episodes.summary: When McGarrett's sister is kidnapped and his father's Champ box stolen from his apartment, Steve and Five-0 discover new clues in his mother's murder, including possible ties to the Japanese Yakuza.

episodes.name: He Kane Hewa'ole
episodes.summary: Five-0 joins the Honolulu Police Department in a high-speed police chase that ends with the driver fatally injured, and a gruesome discovery by the team. The investigation leads to an awkward reunion between Chin Ho and his ex-fianc√©.

episodes.name: Kai E'e
episodes.summary: Five-0 struggles to stay a step ahead of a major tsunami that has the island evacuating its shores as they investigate the disappearance of the head of the Tsunami Warning Center.

episodes.name: E Malama
episodes.summary: When the sole witness in a high-profile murder case disappears, Five-0 must head into the jungle to locate and protect her from assassins who are closing in fast.

episodes.name: Powa Maka Moana
episodes.summary: Five-0 is first on the scene when a pirate attack turns an afternoon pleasure cruise into a kidnap-and-ransom nightmare for a group of wealthy spring breakers.

episodes.name: Loa Aloha
episodes.summary: While Five-0 races to stop a mad bomber before he kills again, Danny gets an unexpected visit from his little brother, Matt, a fun-loving, Wall Street broker. The family reunion is cut short, however, when Danny discovers the real reason that Matt is in Hawaii.

episodes.name: Na Me'e Laua Na Paio
episodes.summary: Five-0 must unravel the mystery of why a mild-mannered sci-fi fan wearing a cape was given truth serum before being tossed out of a 21st-story window. Meanwhile, McGarrett gets an unexpected visit from a CIA agent who shares his personal interest in tracking down the Yakuza who had his parents killed.

episodes.name: Ma Ke Kahakai
episodes.summary: While hiking in a remote area of the jungle to see the famed petroglyphs, McGarrett and Danny instead find a homicide victim. Meanwhile, their aunt's failing health leads Kono and Chin Ho to visit home, where Kono finally learns the truth about the scandal that ended her cousin's career with the Honolulu Police Department.

episodes.name: Ho'opa'i
episodes.summary: When a crime lord moves against the family of an undercover NYPD detective who infiltrated his organization, it's up to Five-0 to stop the policeman from exacting revenge.

episodes.name: Ho'ohuli Na'au
episodes.summary: It's the worst kind of overexposure when world-renowned photographer Renny Sinclair is murdered while on assignment in Hawaii shooting the annual swimsuit edition of a top sports magazine.

episodes.name: Ua Hiki Mai Kapalena Pau
episodes.summary: With the invaluable information that was shared by Agent Jenna Kaye, Five-0 is closer than ever to capturing Wo Fat. Their mission takes an abrupt turn, however, when Danny is exposed to a lethal neurological agent that presents an even greater threat: bio-terrorism on the island.

episodes.name: Oia'i'o
episodes.summary: When Five-0 gets too close to the truth about Wo Fat and his associates, the criminal mastermind retaliates by trying to destroy the team. They've always played by their own rules, but when the Governor can no longer protect them, it's time for Five-0 to pay the consequences of their actions.

episodes.name: Ha'i'ole
episodes.summary: While McGarrett sits in prison awaiting trial for the murder of the governor, Danny brings him a surprise visitor to help clear him. Meanwhile, Kono is suspended for the force, pending an internal investigation.

episodes.name: Ua Lawe Wale
episodes.summary: Gov. Denning assigns Officer Lori Weston to Five-0 to make sure McGarrett and team follow the new rules set by him and also apply her excellent profiling skills to the task force. Meanwhile, as Five-0 investigates the kidnapping of a teenage paddleboard champion, Internal Affairs Capt. Vince Fryer continues his interrogation of Kono.

episodes.name: Kame'e
episodes.summary: At his mentor's request, McGarrett persuades Max to redo the autopsy on a SEAL, thought to have committed suicide, in order to investigate his murder. Meanwhile, Chin Ho worries about Kono hanging out with a group of dirty ex-cops, including Frank Delano.

episodes.name: Mea Makamae
episodes.summary: The FIVE-0 take to the beautiful waters off Hawaii to investigate the murder of a deep sea diver known for his valuable shipwreck finds.

episodes.name: Ma'ema'e
episodes.summary: The FIVE-0's investigation into the murder of the state's women's volleyball coach leads them to find out more bad news about Kono, and Chin Ho reconnects with his former fianc√©e, Malia.

episodes.name: Ka Hakaka Maika'i
episodes.summary: The FIVE-0's investigation into the murder of a wealthy restaurant owner causes McGarrett to take part in a charity MMA fight to the finish.
